sentence: Who teaches the easiest MDE course ?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT ( INSTRUCTORalias0.NAME ) FROM INSTRUCTOR AS INSTRUCTORalias0 INNER JOIN OFFERING_INSTRUCTOR AS OFFERING_INSTRUCTORalias0 ON OFFERING_INSTRUCTORalias0.INSTRUCTOR_ID = INSTRUCTORalias0.INSTRUCTOR_ID INNER JOIN COURSE_OFFERING AS COURSE_OFFERINGalias0 ON OFFERING_INSTRUCTORalias0.OFFERING_ID = COURSE_OFFERINGalias0.OFFERING_ID INNER JOIN PROGRAM_COURSE AS PROGRAM_COURSEalias0 ON PROGRAM_COURSEalias0.COURSE_ID = COURSE_OFFERINGalias0.COURSE_ID WHERE PROGRAM_COURSEalias0.CATEGORY LIKE "MDE" AND PROGRAM_COURSEalias0.WORKLOAD = ( SELECT MIN( PROGRAM_COURSEalias1.WORKLOAD ) FROM PROGRAM_COURSE AS PROGRAM_COURSEalias1 WHERE PROGRAM_COURSEalias1.CATEGORY LIKE "MDE" ) ;
